title: Astragalus Combination #1 - Purist Natural Medicine
description: Astralagus Combination #1 is a combination of astragalus and other complementary herbs to support and strengthen the immune system.
cleaned_text: Description Astragalus Combination #1 is a synergistic combination of astragalus complementary herbs: eleuthero, burdock, red clover and schisandra to support and strengthen the immune system. It is available in a convenient liquid format. Ideal for vegans. Ingredients: 25 Drops (1.25 ml) contain: - Astragalus (Astragalus membranaceus) Root Extract (1:5) Eleuthero (Eleutherococcus senticosus) Root Extract (1:5) Burdock (Arctium lappa) Root Extract (1:5) 40 mg Dried Equivalent ml - Red Clover (Trifolium pratense) Flower Extract (1:5) 40 mg Dried Equivalent - Schisandra (Schisandra chinensis) Berry Extract (1:5) 26.3 mg Dried Equivalent 0.13 ml Other Ingredients: Purified water, ethanol (grain), glycerin. These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA.
